page.title: 10HOW ASKERN HAS CHANGED
page.content: Askern has changed a great deal over the years. Before the pit was built it was a beautiful spa town but now it is an industrial village. I asked a local resident about the changes she had seen in the town. { Mavis Sayer}is{51 years old}and has lived in Askern for{24 years.}She is a schoolteacher. She said the main changes had been the building of the{ {BMX track}and the{library}and the change of{Moss Road Junior School}to a {first school.}She thought that Askern was a better place now because of the industry, but she liked it better before all the changes. She said that the lake was a beautiful part of the village.
